Sentence.sentence: About 80% of our company's year-over-year declines in comparable sales can be attributed to shortfalls ( ' , 短缺) in cold-weather goods, said chief executive Terry Lundgren in a press release.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is building its second ice-breaking ship and setting up research drilling operations on an ice dome 13,422 feet above sea level that is one of the planet's coldest places.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Being stationed in Antarctica involves adapting to life on the planet's driest, windiest and coldest continent, yet each nation manages to make itself at home.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As a result, Black people are thought of a less competent and as having colder personalities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Singers use it to stay away from colds.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Yeah, you know how cold it is in winter?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Well, it is cold ,very cold in winter.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it is cold as 26 degrees below centigrade
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Swedish people always complain that when they visit England, the houses are cold even in the good winter.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He has had his truck adapted for cold temperatures.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For us it'll have to operate for long periods of time in very cold temperatures
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: After a cold start, most of the country should be warm and sunny.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Brittleness remains a problem when building steel structures in cold conditions, such as oil rigs in the Arctic.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: But insurance will be cold comfort following the failure on October 31st of VSS Enterprise, resulting in the death of one pilot and the severe injury to another.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Gazpacho is a cold soup from Spain.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Steel is valued for its reliability, but not when it gets cold.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: They soar up to 40 meters into the cold air.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"冷，凉"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: cold, cool, chilly, frosty, freezing, icy
means: cold ： 最普通用词，强调缺乏温暖，使人不舒服。
cool ： 指既不太热也不太冷。
chilly ： 指使哆嗦的冷。
frosty ： 指雾气在寒冷物体的表面凝结成薄冰时的严寒结霜的温度。
freezing ： 指使人僵直，使东西凝固的冷。
icy ： 多指风暴、风雪和水等冷得使人感到如刺如割。

example.en: The old man is dead and lies in his cold storage.
example.zh: 那老人已经与世长辞，长眠在他的坟墓里了。

list.explanation: 用作形容词&ad 冷汗一身的(地)，胆战心惊的(地)

example.en: I was in a cold sweat while they counted the ballots.
example.zh: 在他们清点选票时，我是浑身冷汗。

example.en: He stood there in a cold sweat, waiting for something to happen.
example.zh: 他胆战心惊地站在那里，等待着怕出什么事。

list.explanation: 平凡的、无魅力的女郎，傻呼呼的姑娘

example.en: He couldn't rate a blind date with a cold biscuit.
example.zh: 他不可能接受别人的安排跟一个傻大姐般的姑娘约会。

word_mean: 冷：缺乏热量或热的程度较低
普通感冒(伤风)：上呼吸道卡他性疾病，可由病毒，混合感染或过敏引起
症状为急性鼻炎、轻度发热、畏寒和全身不适
冷阴极离子源: cold-cathode source 基于彭宁(Penning)放电现象电离试样的离子源。
冷熏: cold smoking 鱼品在20℃~30℃温度下较长时间熏制的方法。
清热、泻火、解毒、凉血等功能的药性。

Sentence.sentence: After hours in the cold and wet, he reached inside and pulled the wallet out hoping to find some id so he could contact the driver,  only to discover it contained ￡400 in notes, with another ￡50 in spare change beside it.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: As a matter of fact, I'm feeling a bit cold.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But her cold voice really annoyed me.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Erin had gone beyond what almost anyone would have done, finding my house on a bitterly cold night, and for that I was extremely grateful.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Finally, after more than an hour in the dark and the icy cold, simon had to make a decision.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hannah's place is divided into several areas, providing shelter for people when it is so cold that sleeping outdoors can mean death.

Sentence.sentence: He was getting colder by the minute.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I learned that a fish is a cold-blooded animal and therefore is very sensitive to water temperature.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: It has been really cold lately and the school should consider letting the students in to get warm before the weather gets even colder.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is so cold that you can't go outside unless fully covered in thick clothes.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was a cold January in 1925 in north Alaska.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was a cold March day in high point, north Carolina.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Later they all admitted they'd felt cold water at first.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: My 10-year-old noticed him and make a comment on how bad it must be to have to stand outside in the cold wind.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Out of breath, I swung open the door and got a blast of cold air that instantly cooled me off.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Scott's last journey, completed as he lay in a tent dying of cold and hunger, caught the world's imagination, and a film made in his honor drew crowds.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: She'd watch me coming down her street, and by the time I'd biked up to her doorstep, there'd be a cold drink waiting.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Swimming pools, wine tasting, and pink sunsets at normal evening hours, not 4 in the afternoon filled the weekend, but the best part- particularly to my taste, dulled by months of cold--weather root vegetables--was a 7 a.m. adventure to the Sarasot
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The students began complaining about how cold it would be.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Then a bottle of cold orange juice, a bag of chips and a pack of ted Williams baseball cards.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Warm colors like yellow make food appear more appetizing, while cold colors make us less hungry.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When a new day breaks, the walls have given up their heat and are now cold enough to cool the house during the hot day; at the same time, they warm up again for the night.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When he handed the medicine to the next musher, shannon‘s face was black from the extreme cold.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Even among those who got a cold, the ones who felt greater social support and received more frequent hugs had less severe symptoms.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: In a recent study involving over 400 healthy adults, researchers from Carnegie Mellon University in Pennsylvania examined the effects of perceived social support and the receipt of hugs on the participants' susceptibility to developing the common cold aft
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: On a cold winter's day, few culinary pleasures can match it.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: People who perceived greater social support were less likely to come down with a cold, and the researchers calculated that the stress-reducing effects of hugging explained about 32 percent of that beneficial effect.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

sentences.en: She is cold to her husband.

jx.jx_en_mean: (亦作 catch cold)become infected with a cold

jx.jx_cn_mean: 无用的安慰，不起作用的安慰

lj.lj_ly: another drop in the inflation rate was cold comfort for the 2.74 million jobless.
lj.lj_ls: 对于274万失业者来说，通货膨胀率的又一次下跌只是无用的安慰罢了。

lj.lj_ly: I began to &B{get cold feet}, but the other two guys were totally positive .
lj.lj_ls: 我开始动摇，可其他两个人却深信不疑。

lj.lj_ly: &B{in the cold light of day} it all seemed so ridiculous.
lj.lj_ls: 在现实生活中，这一切显得如此荒谬可笑。

jx.jx_en_mean: a show of intentional unfriendliness; rejection

lj.lj_ly: the new England manager gave him the cold shoulder .
lj.lj_ls: 新来的英格兰队经理冷待了他。

jx.jx_en_mean: reject or be deliberately unfriendly to someone
jx.jx_cn_mean: 拒绝某人；冷落某人；冷待某人

jx.jx_en_mean: weapons such as swords or knives collectively

lj.lj_ly: the government forces killed them in cold blood.
lj.lj_ls: 政府军残忍地杀死了他们。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 对…持批评（或不支持）态度；对…泼冷水

jx.jx_en_mean: Lacking benefits given to others; neglected.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 冷落的：没有好处以给别人的；被忽视的

entry.def: Something that is cold has a very low temperature or a lower temperature than is normal or acceptable.

example.ex: Rinse the vegetables under cold running water...
example.tran: 用凉的自来水清洗这些蔬菜。

example.ex: He likes his tea neither too hot nor too cold...
example.tran: 他想要杯不凉不热的茶。

entry.def: If it is cold, or if a place is cold, the temperature of the air is very low.

example.ex: The house is cold because I can't afford to turn the heat on...
example.tran: 屋里很冷，因为我没钱付暖气费。

entry.def: Cold weather or low temperatures can be referred to as the cold .

example.ex: He must have come inside to get out of the cold...
His feet were blue with cold.

entry.def: If you are cold, your body is at an unpleasantly low temperature.

example.ex: I'm hungry, I'm cold and I've nowhere to sleep.
example.tran: 我饥寒交迫，甚至连睡觉的地方都没有。

entry.def: Cold food, such as salad or meat that has been cooked and cooled, is not intended to be eaten hot.

example.ex: A wide variety of hot and cold snacks will be available.

entry.def: Cold colours or cold light give an impression of coldness.

example.ex: Generally, warm colours advance in painting and cold colours recede.
example.tran: 通常，绘画中暖色调为近感色，而冷色调为远感色。

example.ex: ...the cold blue light from a streetlamp.

entry.def: A cold person does not show much emotion, especially affection, and therefore seems unfriendly and unsympathetic. If someone's voice is cold, they speak in an unfriendly unsympathetic way.
entry.tran: 冷淡的;冷酷的;不热情的

example.ex: What a cold, unfeeling woman she was...
example.tran: 她真是个冷酷无情的女人！

example.ex: 'Send her away,' Eve said in a cold, hard voice.
example.tran: “把她打发走。”伊芙冷酷无情地说道。

entry.def: A cold trail or scent is one which is old and therefore difficult to follow.

example.ex: He could follow a cold trail over hard ground and even over stones.
example.tran: 他能循着地面上甚至是石头上留下的淡淡的痕迹展开追踪。

entry.def: If you say that someone is cold when they are trying to guess the answer to a question or puzzle, you mean that they are thinking about it in the wrong way and are going to give a wrong answer.
If you have a cold, you have a mild, very common illness which makes you sneeze a lot and gives you a sore throat or a cough.
If you catch cold, or catch a cold, you become ill with a cold.

example.ex: Let's dry our hair so we don't catch cold.
example.tran: 我们把头发吹干，这样就不会感冒。

entry.def: If something leaves you cold, it fails to excite or interest you.
entry.tran: 未能打动;未能激起…的兴趣

example.ex: Lawrence is one of those writers who either excite you enormously or leave you cold.
example.tran: 劳伦斯是那种要么让人激动不已，要么让人觉得索然无味的作家。

entry.def: If someone is out cold, they are unconscious or sleeping very heavily.
entry.tran: 昏迷的;失去知觉的;睡得很沉的

example.ex: She was out cold but still breathing.
example.tran: 她处于昏迷状态，但还有呼吸。

entry.def: If you say that a person, group, or country has been left out in the cold, you mean that they have been ignored by others rather than being invited to take part in some activity with them.

example.ex: Developing countries might be left out in the cold in current world trade talks.
example.tran: 在目前的世界贸易洽谈中，发展中国家可能会受到冷落。

means.word_mean: 1. a mild viral infection involving the nose and respiratory passages (but not the lungs);

sentences.sentence: "will they never find a cure for the common cold?"

means.word_mean: 3. the sensation produced by low temperatures;
1. used of physical coldness; having a low or inadequate temperature or feeling a sensation of coldness or having been made cold by e.g. ice or refrigeration;

sentences.sentence: "if you are cold, turn up the heat"

means.word_mean: 2. extended meanings; especially of psychological coldness; without human warmth or emotion;
3. having lost freshness through passage of time;

sentences.sentence: "dogs attempting to catch a cold scent"
"had her lines cold before rehearsals started"

means.word_mean: 7. so intense as to be almost uncontrollable;

sentences.sentence: "a cold response to the new play"

means.word_mean: 11. unconscious from a blow or shock or intoxication;
12. of a seeker; far from the object sought

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cald, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch koud and German kalt, also to Latin gelu 'frost'

sentences.cn: 母亲对我的批评告诉我，卡夫卡关于“寒冷的深渊”的说法是正确的，而且当你沉浸在写作过程中必要的内省中时，收获并非总是令人愉悦的。
sentences.en: My mother ’ scriticism had shown me that Kafka is right about the cold abyss,and when you make the  introspective ( 内省的 ) descent that writingrequires you are not always pleased by what you find.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 动物们怎么办呢？动物们主要采用三种方法熬过寒冷的冬季：睡觉，适应，或迁徙。
sentences.en: What do animals do?  There are three main ways that animals survive the cold in winter: sleep, adapt or migrate.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 咖啡不能生长在寒冷的气候下.
sentences.en: Coffee will not grow in a cold climate.

sentences.cn: 她朝窗户扫了一眼,看了一眼寒冷的黑夜.
sentences.en: Once she a glance toward the window and caught a glimpse of the cold night.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的国家雪是常见的.
sentences.en: Snow is common in cold countries.

sentences.cn: 友谊又如寒冷的冬夜中炽热的火焰, 温暖了你的心灵.
sentences.en: It is cosy fire on a bitterly cold winter night, warming the heart.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气要穿温暖的衣服.
sentences.en: Wear warm clothes in cold weather.

sentences.cn: 有些植物在寒冷的气候条件下不能结果实.
sentences.en: Some plants will not seed in a cold climate.

sentences.cn: 每年秋天, 寒冷的天气不能阻止人们去看香山的红叶.
sentences.en: Every fall, cold weather can't stop people going to see the red leaves in Xiangshan Park.

sentences.cn: 这是一个源自欧洲的古老传统, 一块大原木在寒冷的圣诞夜带给人们了温暖.
sentences.en: An ancient tradition originating in Europe, Yule log warmed the house during the cold Christmas night.

sentences.cn: 我能想像出在寒冷的早晨滑过厚厚的积雪时的感觉.
sentences.en: I can imagine skiing through deep snow on a cold morning.

sentences.cn: 它们依靠冬眠来度过寒冷的冬季, 而它们的种群则靠它们强大的繁殖力来维持.
sentences.en: They hibernate during the winter cold; and their large litters help them maintain their population.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气到来时, 部队无力继续作战.
sentences.en: At the approach of cold weather, the troops were unable to keep holding the field.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使很多人得了流行感冒.
sentences.en: The cold weather brought on many attacks of flu.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使他们提前离开.
sentences.en: The cold weather antedate ed their departure.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的冬夜已经降临, 把黄昏时短暂的暮色也给吞没了.
sentences.en: The cold winter night had fallen, snuffing out the brief twilight.

sentences.cn: 南北极地带是很寒冷的.
sentences.en: It's very cold in the polar regions.

sentences.cn: 约翰从寒冷的外面进来,尽情享受室内的温暖.
sentences.en: John came inside from the cold and gave himself up to the warmth in the room.

sentences.cn: 他咬咬牙,冲向寒冷的天气.
sentences.en: He gritted his teeth and plunged into the cold weather.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的冬季,钟摆收缩,钟就走得快些.
sentences.en: In very cold winter the pendulum will contract and the clock will go faster.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的地方, 人们穿厚衣服, 戴手套,穿靴子.
sentences.en: In cold places, people wear heavy coats, gloves and boots.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的夜里,他们总是靠在火边取暖.
sentences.en: They kept hanging over the fire on the cold night.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的晚上,我们把狗关在屋内.
sentences.en: We keep the dog indoors on cold nights.

sentences.cn: 在寒冷的早晨他讨厌起床.
sentences.en: He is loath to get out of bed on cold mornings.

sentences.cn: 今天辞起了寒冷的西北风.
sentences.en: Today has cold wind from the northwest.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使树叶变红了.
sentences.en: The cold weather turned the leaves red.

sentences.cn: 大多数卡路里值较高以满足北方寒冷的气候.
sentences.en: Most have a high calorie value answering the demands of the cold northern climate.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使湖水结冰了.
sentences.en: The cold weather froze the lake.

sentences.cn: 和寒冷的冬天相比, 春秋换季节时感冒病菌更容易滋生.
sentences.en: And the cold winter, autumn when the cold season for the virus more easily.

sentences.cn: 慕夏为祖国留下的遗产受到了残酷而冷淡的对待.
sentences.en: Mucha's bequest to his country was received with unkindly cold shoulders.

sentences.cn: 我们受到相当冷淡的接待.
sentences.en: We had rather a cold welcome.

sentences.cn: 投降打破了冷淡的怀疑主义.
sentences.en: Surrender fires the cold skepticism.

sentences.cn: 他的好意被报以[遭致]冷淡的轻蔑.
sentences.en: His kindness was requited with cold contempt.

sentences.cn: 他那冷淡的态度,使所有不熟悉他的人不敢接近他.
sentences.en: By his cold and distant manners he holds off all who are not intimate with him.

sentences.cn: 她姐姐是个冷淡的人.
sentences.en: Her sister was a cold person.

sentences.cn: 他没能打破她 ( 冷淡 ) 的缄默.
sentences.en: He couldn't pierce her ( cold ) reserve.

sentences.cn: 他没有料到会受到如此冷淡的接待.
sentences.en: He hadn't bargained on so cold a reception.

sentences.cn: 发送者的姿势是开放的和友好的, 还是关闭的和冷淡的?
sentences.en: Is the sender's posture open and friendly, or closed and cold?

sentences.cn: 士兵开枪了; 投降激活了冷淡的怀疑论.
sentences.en: The soldiers were fired; Surrender fires the cold skepticism.

sentences.cn: 你可能并不想从维多利亚·贝克汉姆这身装束看到冷淡的意味吧.
sentences.en: You wouldn't want to get the cold shoulder from Victoria Beckham in this getup.

sentences.cn: 冷淡的阳光照着他们的愁眉苦脸和长发白眼.
sentences.en: The cold, pale sunlight fell on their gloomy faces, long hair and lustreless eyes.

sentences.cn: 她没有预料到会受那样冷淡的接待.
sentences.en: She didn't bargain on so cold a reception.

sentences.cn: 她真是个冷酷无情的女人！
sentences.en: What a cold, unfeeling woman she was...

sentences.cn: 他惧怕我的艺术尖刀,正如我害怕他的冷酷无情的钢笔.
sentences.en: He fears the lancet of my art as I fear that of his . The cold steelpen.

sentences.cn: 缺乏同情或感情的; 无情的.
sentences.en: Lacking in feeling or compassion; pitiless and cold.

sentences.cn: 可是这里面 总 有一种冷酷无情的矛盾. ”
sentences.en: But there's some kind of cold , unfeeling contradiction in that business. "
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 廊桥遗梦

sentences.cn: 她是个冷酷无情的人.
sentences.en: She is a cold fish.

sentences.cn: 我们若没有爱,就是与冷酷而无情的世界为伍了.
sentences.en: To deny love is to align ourselves with a cold, uncaring world.

sentences.cn: 淑在感情热烈的时候所说的话,确实是冷酷无情的真理.
sentences.en: What Sue had said in warmth was really the cold truth.

sentences.cn: 他是个冷酷无情的人.
sentences.en: He is a cold fish.

sentences.cn: 他从来不帮助别人, 他是一个冷酷无情的人.
sentences.en: He never help the others, he is a cold fish.

sentences.cn: 但是今天,它却是一个冰冷无情的地方.
sentences.en: But today It'seemed like a cold and heartless place.

sentences.cn: 他们正怀着一种残酷无情的痛苦在重新关心周围的一切.
sentences.en: They were caring again with a cold ruthless bitterness.

sentences.cn: 在一个冷漠、无情的世界里,他们需要互相搂抱,获得温暖和安慰.
sentences.en: They need to cuddle together for warmth and comfort in an indifferent or cold world.

sentences.cn: 她真是个冷酷无情的女人！
sentences.en: What a cold, unfeeling woman she was.

sentences.cn: 其中把他描绘成了一个冷漠无情的人。
sentences.en: It portrays him as cold and uncaring.

sentences.cn: 喜欢冷色的人一般都害羞和安静.
sentences.en: People who like cold colours are probably shy and quiet.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的房间 / 屋子
sentences.en: a cold room/house

sentences.cn: 天气寒冷彻骨。
sentences.en: It's freezing cold .

sentences.cn: 母亲对我的批评告诉我，卡夫卡关于“寒冷的深渊”的说法是正确的，而且当你沉浸在写作过程中必要的内省中时，收获并非总是令人愉悦的。
sentences.en: My mother ’ scriticism had shown me that Kafka is right about the cold abyss,and when you make the  introspective ( 内省的 ) descent that writingrequires you are not always pleased by what you find.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 生活在寒冷地区的人类居住在温暖的房屋里，并且学会了适应。
sentences.en: People in cold places live in warm houses and have learned to adapt.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 动物们怎么办呢？动物们主要采用三种方法熬过寒冷的冬季：睡觉，适应，或迁徙。
sentences.en: What do animals do?  There are three main ways that animals survive the cold in winter: sleep, adapt or migrate.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 咖啡不能生长在寒冷的气候下.
sentences.en: Coffee will not grow in a cold climate.

sentences.cn: 她朝窗户扫了一眼,看了一眼寒冷的黑夜.
sentences.en: Once she a glance toward the window and caught a glimpse of the cold night.

sentences.cn: 除了饥饿 、 寒冷 、 疲倦和渴望外, 我分辨不出哪些时候我还活着.
sentences.en: Except for hunger, cold, tiredness, and longing, I can't tell when I'm alive.

sentences.cn: 友谊又如寒冷的冬夜中炽热的火焰, 温暖了你的心灵.
sentences.en: It is cosy fire on a bitterly cold winter night, warming the heart.

sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气要穿温暖的衣服.
sentences.en: Wear warm clothes in cold weather.

sentences.cn: 有些植物在寒冷的气候条件下不能结果实.
sentences.en: Some plants will not seed in a cold climate.

sentences.cn: 每年秋天, 寒冷的天气不能阻止人们去看香山的红叶.
sentences.en: Every fall, cold weather can't stop people going to see the red leaves in Xiangshan Park.

sentences.cn: 对于很多人来说, 冬季要做的事并不是和寒冷作战, 而是去拥抱它.
sentences.en: For many, winter is not about combating the cold, but embracing it.

sentences.en: The cold winter night had fallen, snuffing out the brief twilight.

sentences.en: It was a cold , dark day, the sky overcast.

sentences.cn: 既不暖和也不十分寒冷; 适度冷.
sentences.en: Neither warm nor very cold; moderately cold.

sentences.cn: 展现向联盟军队的友谊伊拉克人在政权的强制器的寒冷血被谋杀.

sentences.en: Spring has got the fine weather without the hot of summer and the cold of winner.

sentences.en: I think it will be cold this weekend.

sentences.cn: 明尼苏达的多天非常寒冷, 但过一阵子后你就会习惯.
sentences.en: Winter in Minnesota is extremely cold, but after a while you will get used to it.

sentences.en: to catch a cold

sentences.cn: 甚至在那些已患感冒的人当中，社会支持感更强烈并频繁收到拥抱的人的病症也要轻一些。
sentences.en: Even among those who got a cold, the ones who felt greater social support and received more frequent hugs had less severe symptoms.

sentences.en: He fought off the cold by taking aspirin.

sentences.en: Please bear in mind that your cold will get worse if you smoke too much.

sentences.cn: 一般的感冒是由一个病毒, 或者应该说是一群相似的病毒所引起.
sentences.en: The common cold is caused by a virus, or rather by a number of similar viruses.

sentences.en: In his weakened condition, he is very susceptible to cold.

sentences.en: Dot cold a fever, do you feel the medicine of that brand is best?

sentences.cn: 她感冒了.
sentences.en: She got a cold.

sentences.cn: 保持干燥可以预防感冒.
sentences.en: Keeping dry is a prevention against cold.

sentences.cn: 他患重感冒,嗓子都哑了.
sentences.en: He had such a bad cold that he lost his voice.

sentences.cn: 只是一般的头伤风, 没事.
sentences.en: It's just a simple head cold, nothing serious.

sentences.cn: 伤风总是不好.
sentences.en: I can't get rid of this cold.

sentences.cn: 患了伤风不注意护理,可能会酿成重病.
sentences.en: A neglected cold may grow into a serious illness.

sentences.cn: 上周我重伤风,只好卧病在床.
sentences.en: I had to take to my bed with a bad cold last week.

sentences.cn: 如果没伤风的话,我现在一定在工作,而不会在这躺在床上.
sentences.en: If I hadn't cold I d be working instead of lying here in bed.

sentences.cn: 一个冬天总算过完了,连一次伤风感冒也没用, 但愿好运长久.
sentences.en: I've gone all through this winter so far without catching a cold, knock on wood.

sentences.cn: 因为伤风, 他今天只吃了一点馒头.
sentences.en: As he has a cold, he has put on nothing but a little steamed bread today.

sentences.cn: 我因重伤风而被关在家里.
sentences.en: I was kept in by a bad cold.

sentences.cn: 他因重伤风而卧床不起.
sentences.en: He was laid up with a bad cold.

sentences.cn: 他似乎伤风了.
sentences.en: He appears to have caught cold.

sentences.en: No disease is so common as cold.

sentences.en: He has a cold in the nose.

sentences.en: Get out of those wet clothes before you catch cold.

sentences.en: The actor's cold made his voice hoarse.

sentences.en: A cold predisposes a person to other diseases.

sentences.en: I stayed in lest I should catch cold.

sentences.en: That night he felt a cold coming on and took quinine.

sentences.en: Clear, stringy stuff is a sign of an allergy or the beginning of a cold.

sentences.en: I have not get over my cold ( flu, stomach trouble, etc. ) yet.

sentences.en: The cold developed into pneumonia in due course.

Sentence.sentence: Winter in many places is very cold.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What do animals do? There are three main ways that animals survive the cold in winter: sleep, adapt or migrate.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: People in cold places live in warm houses and have learned to adapt.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It’s: why are the British so cold? And they’re talking about the British personality—the famous British reserve.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Franz Kafka once said: Writing is utter solitude ( ' , 独处 ), the descent into the cold abyss ( ' , 深渊 ) of  oneself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: My mother's criticism had shown me that Kafka is right about the cold abyss, and when  you make the introspective ( ' , 内省的 ) descent that writing requires you are not always pleased by  what you find.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And a room with books in it induces, at least in some, a feeling not dissimilar to that of a fire in the fireplace on a cold winter's night.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Yeah, you know how cold it is in winter?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Well, it is cold ,very cold in winter.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it is cold as 26 degrees below centigrade
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Swedish people always complain that when they visit England, the houses are cold even in the good winter.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To protect themselves against the cold weather.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A few months ago, I was down with a terrible cold which ended in a persistent bad cough.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: A nine-year-old central California boy braved strong currents and cold water to swim from San Francisco to Alcatraz Island and back.

Sentence.sentence: For many Americans, 2013 ended with an unusually bitter cold spell.
